name: Notebook
tagline: Online organizer that would allow users to search, create and share notes on the go
body:
![Demo image](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/oNbREPwrAJWLqeYZcyP537HwpPCcnWoSL7KhGifsseCzMRdUP6Kpcm1GVvDqCjDhSbgGcyYrvZBy3_xBpMiZBQxnCqkDM5b1KKEf_JbvGAR_tzX8tQLoaE-ZAnEUvuqgWP9BR5SBCpSbDsDWULQPLMSCXEQWm1z5pXPbkw56ZXrvU8vsuYPB3K29YD468Yltg4JNoHa_vjVqEZRAVyK8ndgdZwDL-wC5BTqAQLPClZ0oEPhZ0Jg7UVkVWQ12ajcNVd5IDwJCpUJuvJsURZsRopy3LqNJ8eOo8riuS6NkIPLpfPWXQqvMTsubmi9kZgN-MK_a6L5KmUP0_YFZE2K7l91A2xMptV4KSVfLZLQw4yjEFIt1MVNul9R-RokEqbi3fEc7OkHQtpy0xTSWW63p-uga9C0m1WDDLgodIYhQaMUCk5MfgwF6ytcWsRSHGAMQrV5fxKkHclX_2ZJmb6y8tkdNNdvhUUVXeM06g9JYYPhVU9ORddhN5I-0HG_sh-weCLDXkaMuMMiT-d3oLANBB0HoAu9FWFTYN0Ec70YrP8EdHZVija5WbxeikP9P4Ub13AW-wA=w1107-h591-no)

I always have notes scribbled all over the place and stickied on my desktop, notepad++ and even on my phone. Sometimes even multiple notes are created and it is difficult to arrange them in order of importance.

**Features:**
Users would be allowed to 3 types of notes: 
* normal plain text notes, 
* images/ photos

Group notes:
* Share notes with friends for them to view and edit

Customising notes:
* Users would be able to change the colour of their notes via colourpicker

Organisation:
* Tags to label and categorise their notes

Search:
* Search for notes via the contents or the labels
